metadata.title: CafePress Coffee Then Music T Shirt Graphic Shirt
features: Casual and Comfortable: Our Men's Value T-Shirt delivers classic comfort in a style all his own. With a traditional fit that runs true to size, this is about to become your new favorite shirt!

Everyday Wardrobe Essential: Our short-sleeve crewneck T-shirts are where casual comfort meets self-expression. Made of comfortable, heavyweight 100% preshrunk cotton, wash with confidence, our tees won't shrink! (Gray colors are made of a heavyweight cotton/polyester blend.)

Professionally Printed in the USA: Each shirt is expertly printed with sharp, vivid designs, our tees are designed to show off your personality, passions and humor. Choose from a variety of t-shirt colors: Kelly Green, Black, Navy, Red, Royal Blue, Brown, Cardinal Red, Charcoal Gray, and Military Green. Imported for final manufacture locally.
Durable: A double-needle stitched bottom and hems add extra durability, and they're tag-less for added comfort. Machine wash inside out, tumble dry low.

Ideal Everyday Shirt or Gift : Treat yourself or surprise family members, friends, colleagues or your favorite teacher. Our beautifully designed graphic t-shirts make a unique and thoughtful present for Christmas, Easter, Father's Day, Birthdays, back-to-school, wedding party, anniversary and so much more.
description: Get easy everyday style with this standard fit short-sleeve t-shirt. Featuring a comfortable crew neck and quality construction, makes it the perfect go-to graphic tee for both men and women. The soft fabric looks as good as it feels. We have provided double stitching on the hems for extra durability. With each time you wash and dry, our tee shirts will get softer. Our cute, funny, and unique designs are printed professionally and make great novelty gifts for any age. With such a large variety of prints, you are sure to find the best tshirt to fit your needs. With CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise. Buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee.
